Text: This WeekMark Just thought Id touch base with you to see if there is a convenient time for us to get together this week so that I can bring you up to speed on what Ive been doing since my arrival As you know I was supposed to be in Tuscany this week and part of next but the trip has been cancelled due to my fathers health If it is okay with you I would still like to be out of the office this Thursday and Friday because my daughter will be out of school I will be here and available to meet with you at your convenience today up until about and tomorrow from until On Wednesday GSS is having their quarterly business review and I have been asked to attend that Please let me know a if my proposed time out of the office is okay with you and b if and when you would like to meet this week Thanks Kim Kimberley A Jacobson Senior Counsel Enron North America Corp Smith Street Houston Texas Tel Fax EMail
